title: Drawing, "Oak trees at Lake Dunmore, Vermont.", August 23, 1917
medium: Pen and black ink, watercolor and colored pencil
inscribed: Caption and date written in pencil at the bottom.
description: Vertical rectangle.  A group of oaks is shown in the foreground, standing at a hillside with a meadow.  A wood is in the left background.  High bottom margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oak trees at Lake Dunmore, Vermont.", August 23, 1917.
August 23, 1917. Pen and black ink, watercolor and colored pencil. Gift of Mrs. Samuel Colman. 1939-85-10-b.
